DOC.brief_title: Glycemic Control Of Carvedilol Versus Metoprolol In Patients With Type II Diabetes Mellitus And Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients screen must insulin produce Type II diabetic ( C peptide positive ) . Must history mild moderate hypertension ( 140179 systolic ; 9019 diastolic ) . Must stable regimen ACE ( angiotensin convert enzyme ) / ARB ( angiotensin receptor blocker ) treatment alone combination treatment . Patient '' laboratory result HbA1c must 6.5 8.5 ( drug treat ) 6.5 7.5 ( diet alone ) . Must stable antidiabetic regimen ( drug treat diet alone ) . Exclusion criterion : Patients use betablocker therapy .
